attributes.action: MPs who profit financially from EU should recuse themselves from EU votes
attributes.background: Currently MPs and Lords can debate and vote on EU related matters even if they benefit financially from the EU, (e.g., subsidies, salaries, pensions, investments). This is a clear conflict of interest and should be avoided for the sake of good governance.

rejection.details: It would be the responsibility of individual MPs to decide to abstain from a vote.
